text: Yesu yi e miriyaan kolon. A yi a fala e xa, a naxa, “Yɛngɛn yamanan naxan yitaxunxi,12.25 yamanana: Ɲinanne nun yinnane Setana sɛnbɛn bun alo yamanan nun a mangan kii naxan yi. Seen naxanye Setana sɛnbɛn bun, xa ne e bode kedi, na luxi nɛn alo yamanan na yitaxun. Nayi, Setana mi ɲinanne kedɛ alo muxuni itoe a falama Yesu ma kii naxan yi. na yamanan kalama nɛn mafurɛn! Yɛngɛn tanden naxan kui hanma taana, na fan kalama nɛn.
